website_summaries.verdict: The Terrain by Ariat surely made consumers appreciate its budget-friendly price. It offered has excellence in providing comfort and support. The toe-box was roomy enough to accommodate their feet. Despite the non-aggressive outsole design, it still gave ample traction on wet surfaces. What left other users disappointed was the stitching and sole issue. In conclusion, this boot delivers all the basics.
pros: A good number of purchasers applauded the product for its zero break-in time
They loved the comfort right out of the box
Many users liked the comfort provided by the Ariat Terrain
They said that they could cover miles wearing it without having hot spots or blisters
The budget-friendly price of this boot was appreciated by a lot of wearers
The Terrain has a roomy toe box, according to quite a few users
The non-aggressive outsole impressed several wearers
They claimed that it was able to give them the traction needed on slippery surfaces
A high percentage of Ariat Terrain wearers enjoyed the arch support provided by the ATS technology
They said that it was superb
cons: The Terrain did not have the quality it had before, according to a significant number of wearers
The stitching in the toe area fell apart and the sole separated from the shoe—these issues happened after wearing it for only a couple of months

customer_reviews.title: Major durability issues
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit great and required very little break in, especially while wearing wool socks/moleskin for hiking. The major issue is that the sole is already starting to peel apart. I've owned these for about a month now, in which I went on a few small hour long hikes, and then a long 4 day hike/trip. Granted it was a demanding trip, but these boots should not be falling apart this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Paid for new and got used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he says they feel like they fit which is awesome. What is not awesome however is I bought new shoes and these have clearly been worn at least once. There is dirt all over and rocks and tree stuff imbedded in the tread. There are also some scuffs. Husband needed them for work so as long as they hold up I’d say they are worth every penny. Only reason it doesn’t have 5 stars is that I am extremely disappointed that I paid for new instead of used and they have clearly been worn.
customer_reviews.author: TrueTomboy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I returned them
customer_reviews.text: Fit and comfort are good as is the style.... But the toe cap appears to be separating from the front of the shoe and this is unacceptable, especially since I've only worn them a dozen times in the month or so that I've owned them. For this reason I am dissatisfied and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes/Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight book for working around my yard. These boots seem to be excellent. I have a more narrow foot, so they are just slightly loose on the sides. I normally wear a size 12/13, depending on the shoe. I ordered size 13 and the length is perfect. They seem to be holding up well, although I've only had them a couple of weeks. I love the cordovan color and the style of the boot. I may need to get new shoe laces as these appear to be wearing just a bit. Regardless, I like these boots so much I bought a second pair for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: Ran large but very nice boot.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boot. It's my second pair. My first pair was in a different leather, the one with the multicolored trim, which I've gotten tons of compliments on. These boots ran very large. I'd say at least a half size if not more. I had room for a thick plantar fasciitis insole which fit when trimmed to a whole size bigger than the listed size of the boot. Since these are winter boots for me, I'm just wearing them with thick socks and the insoles. Very good quality. Very attractive. Would have been 5 stars if they didn't run so big.
customer_reviews.author: Dive now

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe BUT
customer_reviews.text: This shoe/boot has the potential to be really great BUT; It DOES run large like the reviews say. In width and particularly at the top of the lacings. Sizing would be PERFECT for someone with severe ankle swelling. I have wide feet and was swimming in the WIDE sizing. Re-Ordered a REGULAR size/width and very thick socks make them barely usable. I use them for around the house shoes as they never really 'seated-in' like most shoes do so a bit sloppy. They are top quality otherwise. Too bad the manufacturer apparently believes everyone has elephant ankles.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot, But Decreased Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this Ariat boot for over 15 years. I often buy a new pair almost every year. The recent pair I bought in 2020 does not seem to have as sturdy of a sole. The boot is about a half size bigger. Not happy with the changes. I need a good sole for my older feet and to be able to work with the horses. Not sure if they changed manufacturer. I hope they bring their quality back.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sprik

customer_reviews.title: Ariat shoes LAST a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ariat Terrain hiking boots. I bought my first pair 12 YEARS AGO. For a pair of shoes at this price that exceeds all expectations for longevity. Granted, I didn't wear them every single day but I did wear them a lot. I recommend insoles for them if you have flat feet. Other than that I've only had two pairs of shoes that have been as comfortable as these, and they cost way more.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fitness coach and personal trainer. I walk between 5 to 10 miles a day in these and they are rugged! They hold up very well and are very comfortable all day long. I would definitely recommend these and will buy them again when these wear out. Next time they will be the waterproof version. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: davmbar

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance I'm 4e with shoes. Reviews said this is wider than 2e and there right. Fit only slightly tight. Felt comfortable looks great. After two days I'm getting a pressure on my left little toe. Not terrible yet. Could be the 2e fit on my 4e feet. I'm thinking it will improve. I will post an update. My experience with boots is you need to give it 10-15 wearings anyway. Now, being new, there a bit stiff and fatigue my feet during my 2 mile walk in the morning. The leather needs to soften.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer40534

customer_reviews.title: Ariat mens hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Finally a boot that is the size that it is supposed to be! Very comfortable and they appear to be very well constructed. It seems to me that many boots have such an abrupt curve in the shape of the toe that they are in effect to short for the intended size. Sizes seem to generally be smaller as well. An old 10.5 seems to be the new 11. Anyway, for me the 11.5 2E from Ariat fits well. The moderate height of these boots is just right to keep sand out while walking in the desert without being to hot and still protecting the ankles from cactus spines.
customer_reviews.author: Desert DogTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe, Laces too long and slippery, otherwise very servicable.
customer_reviews.text: Worn almost every day around the farm and barn. A pair lasts me around one year before the rubber over the toes separates and leaks water. This is my go-to shoe for daiily farm work. My only complaint is that evry pair I've bought has laces that are too long. It is impossible to adjust them with a standard shoe-tying knot so that part of the lace doesn't drag on the ground. So I end up having to re-tie these every few hours when the dragging lace catches on something.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Logan

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be a nice boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these hiking boots based on performance reviews. First pair were purchased using my shoe size for each shoe style I currently own, 11 wide or EE. So I purchased the same size. Turned to be too big. Returned them to Amazon for the 10.5 EE. Five days later I had my boots. Haven’t tried them on the trail yet, but they do feel the right size for my foot. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: The Finisher

customer_reviews.title: Every day boots
customer_reviews.text: They basically keep your feet off of the rocks: kinda cheap, little support, hold up certainly $90 worth. Good for working on the farm (treads are minimal and easy to clean). Nice for long walks, but I wouldn't dream of serious hiking with them. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: 2nd set in 5 years
customer_reviews.text: This boot is amazing. My last pair, after 5 years and multiple rehabs are still going strong (even with original laces). These boots have enough interior height to comfortably add additional insoles for added comfort and are light weight. Have worn parts of the soles and toes away but they have not separated from the rest of the boot. I hesitated giving a review until I found that the new ones seem to be built the same as the old.
customer_reviews.author: Russell D Strough

customer_reviews.title: Wide means extra wide
customer_reviews.text: Wide came as EE, not E. I don't know why Amazon didn't clarify this but in athletic socks they are now too loose for me. They are a good value for the price, and I expect that with a heavy traditional hiking sock the fit will be alright but kind of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light, and on sale
customer_reviews.text: I bought a half size up as my size wasn't available, but they're still very comfortable and they're not heavy, which is a plus; Walking in snow in heavy boots is exhausting. Speaking of snow, I'm happy in the knowledge that when the snow comes and I put on heavier socks the larger size means they'll still be comfy. A little big, yes, but nice and comfortable. I may buy another pair in a different style, in fact... Assuming I can get my size this time. ;) All in all, I'm very pleased with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mcfee

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable boots, but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots for everyday use on hard floors. Broken in right out of the box. The only issue I have is the leather occasionally secretes an orangish color residue in spots. Weird and a wet cloth take it right off. At first I thought I had stepped on something that splattered on them, but it has done it several times. Still really nice boots.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hay

customer_reviews.title: excellent error
customer_reviews.text: The bad news is I didn't get what I ordered - women's terrain boots size 10. I received Mens size 10. The good news is that the fit is perfect. I'll know what to order next time. Due to foot injuries my left foot is wider than the right and it 's hard to get the fit I need. because they are lace up I can adjust them to accommodate my right foot. Excellent error.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Garvey

customer_reviews.title: This product is identified incorrectly. This is a man's boot, not a woman's
customer_reviews.text: Too big for me, this is not a woman's boot. I did reorder a smaller size. They still seem a little big. I haven't decided if I'm going to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best boot ever
customer_reviews.text: Best boot ever! I have a feminine side when it comes to boots- my closet is full of them!! But these quickly moved to the front/go to / everyday boot. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe/ good price
customer_reviews.text: Really like my new sapados. I walk a lot at work and have a nagging heel spur, but these Ariat shoes are very comfortable. The price was right also. Most compareable shoes are well over $100
customer_reviews.author: pbp555

customer_reviews.title: Top notch boots!
customer_reviews.text: These Ariat boots are top notch! May be the best boots I've ever worn. They fit as expected, are very comfortable and have a stylish, rugged look to them. They are well constructed, sturdy and excellent padding/ cushioning. I also have several pairs of various Timberland styles - these Ariats are every bit just as good. These boots are very comfortable for work, walking/ hiking and are a stylish choice for everyday wear or casual office wear. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These boots are my weekend shop/yardwork boots. The sole is already separating from the upper after only one year of light use. I've bought this model for may years and this is the worst performance I've gotten in longevity. Very disappointing and will reach out to manufacturer for a solution. Quality control has either changed dramatically or i got a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Spencer

customer_reviews.title: A great boot
customer_reviews.text: I have be wearing Ariat western boots for years and wanted a shoe for more casual and yard work. These boots are perfect and as expected from Ariat they fit perfectly. Every pair of boots that have come from Ariat fit exactly as the size they indicate. The quality is great and after wearing them all day my feet and legs do not feel at all fatigued. The style of this boot can be worn with any casual paint anywhere you want to go. I would recommend these boots to anyone that is on their feet all day or just for causal every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: R Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Multi Purpose Boot
customer_reviews.text: Best multi purpose boot ever! This is my husband’s fourth pair even though they last for years. Finally bought myself a pair and they are one of the few shoes I do not have to add support for plantar fasciitis. Great supportive footbed and true to size like most Ariat boots. They work equally well for walking, hiking, working, or jumping on horse.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vano

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: I remove the insert & replace it with an orthopedic insert. I do this with all my shoes to help cope with plantar fasciitis. I have always liked Ariat boots but they don't or I have not been able to find the wide width in the women's styles. Not to mention I wear a size 12 women's shoe. It's appears to be a good boot. I wear them for both riding and around the barn . One problem. They send you a ragistration card with the the boots but I couldn't find how to register on the Ariat website.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Saw them locally
customer_reviews.text: When I saw these in a local store they felt light and looked really well made. The price was a bit much and I tried to stop thinking about these Ariat Terrain hiking boot shoe. I checked Amazon out of curiosity, and of course they had them, and the price was ten bucks less! On the next visit to that retail store I once again looked at this awesome boot. That afternoon I went to Amazon again. This time I selected the "buy now" option. They came very quickly and I am completely pleased. The Ariats feel great when riding or walking. My horse is actually a Honda cbr motorcycle. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Island Rick

customer_reviews.title: ... pair of Arial heritage lace up boots which I love so I thought these might be as comfortable for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pair of Arial heritage lace up boots which I love so I thought these might be as comfortable for work. My mistake, the shoe liners are cheaper with only one jel pad at the heel. The leather is much stiffer if it is leather. They are tough to tighten the front area with the laces and are to wide at the ball area for me, so a little uncomfortable walking around. Not my favorite boot
customer_reviews.author: Bradley George

customer_reviews.title: I wear 13 EE or better in EVERYTHING. These needs to be a 12 normal width for me.
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, always plan on getting better insoles. These are a light shoe, time will tell their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Paschall

customer_reviews.title: Ariat Boot
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several pairs of these and decided to attempt to buy a pair on Amazon. Very happy and saved $10 after all taxes and delivered the next day. Very Pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: AWJr

customer_reviews.title: Needed a more aggressive tread on sole.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the greatest fit and the soles are a bit thin, and slippery in loose gravel and sand.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great general waterproof work shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is at least my third pair of these shoes! They are a great waterproof shoe that lasts and is comfortable! They do start out feeling tight, but they just have to be broken in due to the nature of a leather shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advetized!
customer_reviews.text: Received item in a timely manner. Item was exactly as advetized. Ariat boots are simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: ZIP

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for down at the barn. So far, so good and is holding up well. Comfortable and good traction. Also works well for western riding.
customer_reviews.author: drfitmindandbody

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoe experience I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: This boot was awful. I ordered a size down and it was still too big. My toes didn’t have room to go another size down and I couldn’t tighten the boots enough. The loops were touching and couldn’t go any tighter and the boot was still loose causing nasty blisters almost immediately. I expected better from Ariat.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Large For Me And A Bit Heavy
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair of Ariat shoes and they did not fit me well with the size being somewhat larger than what I'm used to. I normally wear either ECCOs or Merrells and wear US13. If the Ariats came in 12.5, I think they'd be a great fit for me. They were a bit too heavy for me too. I think the water resistant pair is even heavier. I returned them so didn't get to test them for durability; however, I believe the quality in workmanship to be high.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeCipher

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, long lasting and great fit means you will wear them often. They act as boots but feel more like sneakers. The only thing is the sole is slippery on wet tile floors, very slippery
customer_reviews.author: William Sattler

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday wear and no break-in needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of Ariat Terrain boots. No break-in needed; quality workmanship; good looks. Soles wear very well. My only concern about Ariat Terrain is that after some wear, the leather seems to loosen and the opposing lace holes come closer together. So I would like them a little narrower, but those are not available. The solution is thicker socks...OK, but can be kind of warm. Still...I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: kcs

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to boot for work and light hiking. I order a new pair every 6 months. Great value
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and design but lacks a lug sole
customer_reviews.text: This boot is very well designed and fits well. I wear 11.5 and that size fit me fine with plenty of toe room. I like the old style eyelet lacing system. It laces up tight without having to pull up through the lacing system. It is a very comfortable boot to wear and is made of high quality materials. It does have a design flaw if you are using it for hiking. It lacks a lugged sole. The lugged sole (for example Vibram) keeps small pebbles From acting like ball bearings between the sole and a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: William Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Super Support
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this style for over ten years. This is the most comfortable supportive shoe I've worn, long wearing, great quality. 91/2 W, I hope they never stop mfg them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shoppen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size smaller than I usually wear for boots, but are still a bit loose, even when tied tightly.I wear an 11 shoes and 11.5 boot. I got these in an 11 and find it crazy to have to get a 10.5 for a better fit. Who know if and where it would be too small should I have done that. I can live with it. Otherwise, they are nice boots....well made, good-looking and comfortable. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Web Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: A Smiling Nurse!
customer_reviews.text: I am an ER nurse, and a car wreck many years ago has made it difficult to run the halls as I once did. Due to the old injuries and years of "foot work" as a nurse, my ankles have really started to bother me, and these Ariat boots were just the thing to provide the extra support I needed to keep going. I was amazed at how light they are, and the laces make for easy on/off that I feared would give me problems. Great support from the sides as well as the well padded insole made me want to do the Happy Dance, even after a long shift!
customer_reviews.author: WM. D. HICKS

customer_reviews.title: Good as expected from Ariat
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, good quality as expected by Ariat. I've owned Ariat boots for the past 10 years and this is my first pair of hiking boots by Ariat. Not heavy as I wear them for IT support for a hospital so my daily walk is tile, concrete, sometimes gravel and dirt, and carpet. Good feel and good look with khakis and dress shirt.
customer_reviews.author: CountryCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Great overall boot...
customer_reviews.text: Great work boot or riding! Been wearing for years, lightweight plus great support for standing/walking on concrete floors.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Only shoe for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th or 6th pair of these shoes. Before retiring, I worked at a hospital and was on my feet all day, and these are the only shoes that I could wear and not have any problems. I always have a pair for around the house during the week and another one for when I go somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: dumplin

customer_reviews.title: New Ariat Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Ariat Shoes. I like them very much. I had noticed several people wearing them and I had gone on line to Amazon and looked at them. I spent several months making up my mind and I belive I made the correct choice. They fit well and are very comfortable. Plus they are light weight and I think look good. I have had several good comments on them from other people.
customer_reviews.author: Clovis Miller

customer_reviews.title: comfortable  and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair after years of good service from my forest pair.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Webb

customer_reviews.title: He finds them very comfortable to wear in his work where he does a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots! He works in construction and is also around horses everyday. He finds them very comfortable to wear in his work where he does a lot of walking on job sites. He is VERY HARD on his shoes so we buy a new pair about every 6 months. They are the only boots he likes to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a good boot for summer work that requires you to be on your feet alot
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I bought this spring, so I have a "clean" pair for work, as well as a pair for the barn. Very comfy, haven't had any traction issues, though I can already tell they're not going to last as long as I would like. Now if only Ariat would make Men's Terrain in black, or better yet, Women's boots wide enough to get a foot into...
customer_reviews.author: Somewhere in Michigan.

customer_reviews.title: You'll be ordering a second pair you'll like them that much!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots,I work in these,and they are really comfortable!,bonus they dont stink after a long day!very waterproof ,wear good,non aggressive sole,which going into customers homes is important.
customer_reviews.author: Smokin

customer_reviews.title: good boots
customer_reviews.text: this is my second pair of Ariat Terrains. The first was almost indestructible, I thought they were worn out 2 years ago but they're still holding together today. I wear these to work around the house and light backpacking. I don't like that they aren't made in USA, but I can't complain about the cost very much either.
customer_reviews.author: toby

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pairs of these boots and usually get a year out of them. This last pair I bought in March 2017 have started coming apart in May 2017, the toe on the left boot has come completely unglued. I would like a rep to give me a call about warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie R. Marlatt

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: This boot is very well made. I have had three pair of these boots and i am very satisfied. I havent found another boot to match this quality. The sole is the perfect thickness and comfortable. My feet dont hurt at all after wearing these all day.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Behles

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots have lasted over 2 years of hard hvac service and installation work the insoles were never very good I have used off the shelf brand and they worked fine the leather and the sole have been tough as nails . I have just ordered another pair of Ariat boots the flex pro model this time.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: everyday wear don't wear anything else but this shoe ,his 3rd pair
customer_reviews.author: DEBB

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase of Ariat
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, easy to break in and looks good in situations other than work and hiking. This is my second purchase of Ariat. First introduced to brand in Arizona when I was visiting family and needed (last-minute) some hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Grey

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots.
customer_reviews.text: My 5th pair over the past 15 years. I buy shoes for comfort and quality. They also look good with is a plus. Can't go wrong buying Ariat.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Goodnight

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's second pair. They look good. Fit good. Best deal on them seems to be Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent
customer_reviews.text: The boots are an excellent rugged design....very stylish....prefect casual boot.....cost was just right.....great boot....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your search is over...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second pair after 5 years of hard use...and the first ones are still functional, comfortable and don't look too bad... an impressive, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.text: I work two jobs, one as a carpenter and part time retail at a Home Depot. I bought my first pair of these shoes 6 months ago. I am really hard on shoes and these got pretty messed up in 6 months but they weren't broken down just ugly. I bought a second pair to wear for "good" until my ugly ones give up. They are comfortable and durable and I will keep buying them. I gave them 4 stars because the price went up.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable boots that can take a beating.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I have never had a pair of boots that fit so well, and have lasted so long. I normally ruin a pair of boots in 3-6 months and these have lasted about a year with no issues. Will keep on buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Dillgerkinsbergh

customer_reviews.title: Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after purchasing the product from Tractor supply. I needed a half size bigger and they did not sell it. I gave the other pair to a friend These are very good shoes! Fast service and the correct size from Amazon, than you!
customer_reviews.author: IT Department

customer_reviews.title: Love these. This is my second pair after I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. This is my second pair after I wore out my first pair after 5 years. Night and lightweight. It does take awhile to break in the ankle part, but I still like them. Fits well
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot - you won’t go back once you try these
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cameron

customer_reviews.title: coming apart at toes??
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but this last pair started coming apart at the toes, been using for years same brand,style just ordered another pair.only 6 weeks old! Not worn daily!
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Formhals

customer_reviews.title: returning to purchase the men's 7-1/2 as the fit is PERFECT for the arch support I need
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair. I accidentally purchased women's... had to cancel that, returning to purchase the men's 7-1/2 as the fit is PERFECT for the arch support I need. They last a couple years then go to "barn work boot" status (usually double the time) using the new ones for everyday wear and the oldest pair goes to the burn barrel :-)
customer_reviews.author: Laura G. Kieser

customer_reviews.title: they are comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing for some years... great for mt life style
customer_reviews.author: John Bo

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!  Good support!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite work boots. Found these cheaper on Amazon than Tractor supply.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl55

customer_reviews.title: Little tight
customer_reviews.text: I went with the reviews and ordered a half size smaller. Probably shouldn't have. I like the construction and look, but they are a little narrow and tight. The length seems okay. I won't be able to wear a heavy sock. I purchased them trying to find a hiking boot that would give suport for injured ankle and tendons - won't be sure if they really work until I wear them more.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Swan

customer_reviews.title: She loves them and says they are very comfortable for both horseback riding and walking
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this exact boot that we've purchased for our daughter. She loves them and says they are very comfortable for both horseback riding and walking. Do NOT use them to clean/muck around in - they will fall apart. She will definitely be ordering another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots, easy on & off
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boots, easy on & off, a tad bit wider, but length is great. A little wider is great for room for a thicker sock, but it is not over wide for a regular sock, just lace the laces a little tighter. A very well built & designed boot. It is my 2nd pair of these. (one brown & one cammo)
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended these to me as work shoes. They don't have enough arch support and are already wearing down and coming apart after using daily for a month. Might be okay as an occasional hiking boot, but not for anything else... No warranty or anything.... Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Williams

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for the Hubs and he is enjoying them. He has a wide fit, but typically EE width does the trick. These run slightly narrower through the toe, but not so badly that he even considered giving them back. All in all, a nice looking comfortable shoe and he's already worn them tromping through the woods to check deer stands.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Mann

customer_reviews.title: Love Ariat boots
customer_reviews.text: I have already worn out one set of Ariat shoes similar to these. I assume the slightly looser fit than the old ones is because these are actually hiking boots, but I will just be using them for casual wear or yard work. Thicker socks fill them up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I bought three pair of Ariat shoes/boots on Amazon. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pair of Ariat shoes/boots on Amazon. Both pairs of shoes came apart within a month of daily use. It appeared the stitching was old and broke around the reinforced toes.
customer_reviews.author: paul lemmons

customer_reviews.title: Yard and landscaping
customer_reviews.text: Have them since June 2015. Use them around the house in all conditions involving yard work. Replaced laces and shoe souls so far.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: Best boot for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wear mine every single day. Riding, mucking stalls, all farm work. Comfortable, support, and well made. I get about two years out of a pair so I say money WELL Spent! Been buying this boot for years. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Erika G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them. He usually blows through shoes so I bought these knowing that ariat is a well trusted durable brand (we buy their work and ranch boots regularly). They've put up with quite a beating so far and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Feels Nice - Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: Tried them on as soon as I got them to make sure about the fit, they fit spot on. I only walked around the house with them because it was raining so not sure how they will feel outdoors doing what you do with boots on also not sure about longevity, but so far I really like them and with the coupon the price is right !!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Cure for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Best comfortable shoe I have ever worn, fixed my plantar fasciitis in 2-3 weeks, After 2 years of previous suffering.
customer_reviews.author: Kyfishinman

customer_reviews.title: The are Really Comfortable and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: These boots are one of the most comfortable footwear I have ever owned. I wear them daily and get at least 2 years of wear before they go into the “mow the yard” rotation where I get another couple of years out of them. This is my third pair so I guess I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Snowman

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I finally found one in which the holes for the laces don't break. I've gone through many pairs, but these once don't break.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F.

customer_reviews.title: They earned my 5 star rating
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, at last a pair of boots that work on my feet. How refreshing! I find these work boots very comfortable. Yes, I would recommend these boots to others. How to go Ariat.
customer_reviews.author: David E Mahnke

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair of these that I have bought.. love the comfort of these boots and enough height to wear with my orthotics. Only complaint I have is that I wished the sole was a bit more aggressive, they are a bit slick on wet pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfebyte

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit large but still very comfortable even on long walks
customer_reviews.author: DTDogger

customer_reviews.title: I've owned 4 different pairs of this same boot over the last 9 years
customer_reviews.text: The title alone should tell you how much I like this product. Great fit, very versatile for outdoor use. I use it for hiking, horseback riding, chores outside and even as a casual boot with jeans. In general its very easy to clean and maintain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ariat Terrain Boots in two years. They are used for work, standing on concrete for 10 hours a day. This are the most comfortable boots I have ever owned. The shoe laces are the only thing that could be a little longer lasting. This shoe does not make you feel like you are wearing a brick on your foot.(Very light weight over a lot of other boots). I will buy another pair when these wear out!!!! One note, I am a guy that weighs a lot more than the average guy and loves these shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed. Love the boot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered women's wide and was sent men's. Really disappointed. Love the boot, I've had two other pair but I've broke my ankle so I need a wide
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like every Ariat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe for my husband since I've had the women's version for about 5 years and they're still fine. The only question was size. For women they tend to run a little on the larger size. I generally wear an 8, but sometimes 7 and 1/2 so I bought the smaller size. I did the same for my husband and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these but has a hard time finding the wide sizes as the store.
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: Runs big but still a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Do not make your feet look huge as many hiking boots do. But they do run large. If you are slim you can pull the laces as tight as possible but you will feel like you need your thickest pair of wool socks if you got your regular size. The sole does not look that impressive but it does protect your feet well on rock and gravel. They are nice looking and well made.
customer_reviews.author: GrannieAnnie

customer_reviews.title: are great they last me well over a year
customer_reviews.text: Ariat Men Terrain Hiking shoe .. are great they last me well over a year.. I know what kind of shoe I won’t, the next time I need a new pair. It my fourth pair..David
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just run a bit on the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, just run a bit on the small side. I ordered the largest size available so will make it work with s light sock.
customer_reviews.author: michael h

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots originally for my husband to use while horseback riding but they're so comfortable that he wears them all weekend and anytime he has outdoor projects to work on since they grip the ground so well. I have a pair in the women's style and they're also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Ariat is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made boot. And very comfortable as well. Ariat is the only boot brand that I buy anymore. Fits like a glove and is the most comfortable I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: ChefKronk

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy these again
customer_reviews.text: The boots are not the same quality that Ariat has always offered. Poor quality and pealing apart all around. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ARIAT mens 10002178 Terrain Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: TerrainThe original endurance boot. Built to perform, and win, the Terrain takes on the most grueling rides and finishes strong.
feature_bullets: Western-inspired performance riding boot in full-grain leather featuring pull-on loops at scallop and stirrup-friendly outsole design
ATS Advanced Torque Stability composite shank
